title: please do not close window while payment is processing
body: its been saying this for 15 minutes what should i do please help

replies.body: It sounds like there's some hiccup in processing your request.  If you're still stuck there, you could try again.  If you're still getting an error, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help individually.  We'll get back to you!
thanks for your reply, the process finally finished and i got my RP
